decision_tree package¶

Submodules¶

decision_tree.CART module¶

The CART module implements the Classification and Regression Tree algorithm for decision trees to create a model using data provided, performing training/testing and providing the score.

decision_tree.CART.run_cart(X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test, output_folder)¶

Run the Classification and Regression Tree algorithm.

Parameters:
  • X_train (dataframe) – training examples
  • X_test (dataframe) – test examples
  • y_train (dataframe) – target training examples
  • y_test (dataframe) – target test examples
  • output_folder – location of the output / results

decision_tree.DT_Utils module¶

The DT_Utils module provides helper functions for Decision Tree algorithms implementation, model creation and analysis.

decision_tree.DT_Utils.load_dt_model(pickle_model)¶

Retrieve model using Pickle binary format.

Parameters:pickle_model (string) – location of Pickle model
Returns:Pickle model for re-use
Return type:object
decision_tree.DT_Utils.plot_dt(model_name, y_actual, y_test, output_folder)¶

Plot decision tree, y (training) vs y (test/actual).

Parameters:
  • model_name (string) – title for the model used on the output filename
  • y_actual (dataframe) – target results
  • y_test (dataframe) – test targets
  • output_folder (string) – location of the output / results
decision_tree.DT_Utils.save_dt_model(model_name, model, folder)¶

Save model using Pickle binary format.

Parameters:
  • model (dataframe) – model reference
  • model_name (string) – title for the model used on the output filename
  • folder (string) – location of model output
decision_tree.DT_Utils.score_dt(model_name, model, X, y, y_actual, output_folder)¶

Score a decision tree model.

Parameters:
  • model_name (string) – title for the model used on the output filename
  • model (dataframe) – model reference
  • X (dataframe) – examples
  • y (dataframe) – targets
  • y_actual (dataframe) – target results
  • output_folder (string) – location of the output / results

decision_tree.GBR module¶

The GBR module implements the Gradient Boosting Regression ensemble for decision trees.

decision_tree.GBR.run_gbr(X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test, output_folder)¶

Run the Gradient Boosting Regression ensemble algorithm.

Parameters:
  • X_train (string) – training examples
  • X_test (string) – test examples
  • y_train (dataframe) – target training examples
  • y_test (dataframe) – target test examples
  • output_folder – location of the output / results
